title: Decisions, Decisions! (TEFC)
brief_description: Illustrates problems managers can encounter when failing to approach decision making and implementation logically. Demonstrates the importance of utilising the knowledge and views of the team when deciding on matters affecting them. Famous decision makers from the past, Brutus, Queen Elizabeth I, Churchill and Montgomery, act as a review panel and confront an incompetent manager with his mistakes. Features John Cleese and Prunella Scales. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
